message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. I'm offering you a fair 40% to start.
Let's split it evenly, Alice. A fair deal saves us time and money.
Bob, time is running out. I'll take a little less, but 45% is the best you'll get.
Alice, let's be realistic. This is a good deal considering the inflation. We both need to come out ahead.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  50/50 is the only fair deal at this point. Take it or leave it.
